items.sentence: I was one of the best students in the class.
We\'re having some guests over this evening.
We\'re lucky Tom is here to help us do this.
We\'ve got a very stressful day ahead of us.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom is from Australia.
I\'m seriously considering moving to Boston.
I\'m seriously thinking of selling my house.
I believe you\'ve answered all my questions.
I bet you\'re feeling really good right now.
Nobody knows what will happen in the future.
I\'m sorry to have kept you waiting so long.
I\'m sure Tom will be very happy to see you.
I\'m sure it was Tom that I saw in the park.
I\'m sure that Tom has never been to Boston.
I\'m sure that you need this more than I do.
I just want to know why you brought me here.
I just want to talk with you a little while.
Who cares whether Tom eats egg yolks or not?
I don\'t think you\'ll like the alternative.
I was taking a bath when the telephone rang.
